description: Tender chicken and crispy bacon are a delicious pairing. This lemon pepper recipe is full of flavour and will take you only 30 minutes from go to whoa.
name: Speedy Lemon Pepper Chicken With Mash & Bacon Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths COOK lemon & pepper chicken breast steaks
0.25 bunch continental parsley, sprigs picked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 6 minutes, stirring, or until golden. Transfer to a plate and cover loosely to keep warm.
Add oil to pan. Cook chicken, in 2 batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover loosely to keep warm.

Heat same clean pan over medium-high heat. Add beans and 2 tbs cold water, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until tender and water has evaporated. Return bacon to pan and toss to combine.
Meanwhile, heat mash according to packet instructions. Divide mash among plates. Top with chicken and bean mixture. Scatter over parsley and serve with lemon wedges.
